text: Re: #Powerball. I wonder how many people have tossed out $100 or $50,000 or $1 million winning tickets unexamined when they see no one won a, say, $500 million jackpot?

text: Watching classic TV episodes for a few essays I've been commissioned to write for an very fun/interesting upcoming anthology & I'm surprised by how weirdly emotional the impact of encountering something like, say, the TAXI theme after several years can be. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=07tYdd7drSE …
